#Text=United States : Dr. Larry Nassar sentenced in sexual abuse case
#Text=Saturday , January 27 , 2018
#Text=Former USA Gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar was sentenced to prison on Wednesday for 40 to 175 years in Ingham County , Michigan , United States .
#Text=Nassar pleaded guilty in November to seven charges of sexual assault in Ingham County , however , he is alleged to have victimized over a hundred girls over several years .
#Text=Nassar is currently serving a 60-year sentence for federal child pornography charges .
#Text=Judge Rosemarie Aquilina , presiding over the Ingham County Circuit Court in Lansing , Michigan , handed down the sentence , stating :
#Text=" I 've just signed your death warrant . "
#Text=Former US President Barack Obama with members of the 2012 Olympic gymnastics team .
#Text=Image : White House .
#Text=( Reuseterms . )
#Text=Rachael Denhollander first accused Nassar , filing a criminal complaint in 2016 .
#Text=Nassar was charged in Ingham County with seven counts of sexual abuse and pleaded guilty in November of 2017 .
#Text=The true number of victims is alleged to exceed one hundred .
#Text=During the sentencing hearings in court over 150 women testified Nassar abused them .
#Text=Alleged victims include famous Olympic gymnasts , such as Simone Biles , Aly Raisman , and Gabby Douglas , although Nassar was not specifically charged with abusing them .
#Text=Judge Aquilina read out parts of a statement Nassar submitted to the court .
#Text=In the statement , Nassar wrote , " I was a good doctor , because my treatments worked and those patients that are now speaking out are the same ones that kept coming back over and over " .
#Text=He also criticized an earlier judge for going " ballistic " .
#Text=Aquilina declined to read the entirety , citing concern for the victims ; " I do n't want them re-victimized by the words in the letter " , she said .
#Text=Nassar served as the team physician for USA Gymnastics for years , spanning four Olympic Games .
#Text=Simultaneously , he served with Michigan State University .
#Text=He abused his victims under pretense of treating them as a doctor .
#Text=Nassar 's case has led to allegations of lack of oversight by Michigan State University , USA Gymnastics , and the United States Olympic Committee ( USOC ) .
#Text=At USA Gymnastics , prior to the sentencing three board members resigned over the case on Monday , as well as its president last year .
#Text=Corporate sponsors of the organization also pulled out .
#Text=The current president of USA Gymnastics , Kerry Perry , who was appointed in December , released a statement after the sentencing :
#Text=" During the last seven days , more than 150 courageous women have shared their deeply personal experiences and how Larry Nassar ’s despicable crimes impacted their lives . [ ... ]

#Text=As stated on my first day on Dec. 1 , 2017 , I will not waver on my commitment to focus each and every day on our organization ’s highest priority — the safety , health and well-being of our athletes .

_	_	_	_

#Text= The purpose of this message is to tell all of Nassar ’s victims and survivors , directly , how incredibly sorry we are .

#Text=Both Reuters and the Los Angeles Times noted applause in the courtroom when Nassar was escorted out .
